name: M&B Technologies
overview:
M&B Technologies LLC, an e-commerce solutions company, provides Web-based management solutions to B2B and B2C clients. It focuses on product catalog, visual merchandising, Internet traffic, and content management module; and e-marketing services, such as search engine optimization, search engine marketing, keyword analysis, Website traffic analysis, business alignment, Web site promotion, keyword research, search engine submission, link exchange, and traffic analysis. The company also focuses on fulfillment/logistics, which include inventory control management, inventory on demand, and print on demand; call center, client account management, and program/store administration; and custom modules, which include inventory management systems, content management system, print on demand, and prints and frames on demand. In addition, it offers services, such as integration of order processing, shopping cart interface, credit card, and production management and shipping; security, hosting and data storage, and disaster recovery.

The company was founded in 1984 and is based in Trenton, New Jersey. As of february 11, 2009, M&B Technologies LLC operates as a subsidiary of Princeton Fulfillment Solutions, LLC.

acquisition.source_description: Princeton Fulfillment Solutions Acquires M&B Technologies
